name: Referee Frank
author: Hillshire Farm(R) Brand
summary: Your first good call of the game.
ingredients: 1 (16 ounce) package Hillshire Farm Lit'l Smokies®
directions: Before the   heats up, heat your Hillshire Farm® Lit'l Smokies® according to package directions
Now, Referee Frank needs a jersey
Wrap white American cheese around each smoked sausage and give the referees their stripes using BBQ sauce
Stick a toothpick through the middle of the Lit'l Smokies® smoked sausage, and slide the grape tomato onto the toothpick, placing the football next to Referee Frank
Good catch ref! Almost game ready! Cut yellow American cheese into small slices and place them on the grape tomato to create football laces
Don't forget to use sea salt as the eyes
They're very important for making the tough calls
